name: Mansion clicker
description:
This is a simple clicker game made in rpg maker mv.

the game is in a very early state and is very short but future updates and patches will arrive at a latter date.

ps: this game is more of a demo right now and feel free to mod this game

My youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgh8a2aKlcUXoNiM0ZmP5CA
